body_html: I updated the info and removed any related to GPU/CUDA. Please, note that this issue happens while running the tensorflow/tools/docker/parameterized_docker_build.sh script on a CentOS 7.4 host. The script creates a devel docker container that is used to build TensorFlow. That is, all the environment fields are related to the docker container configured by the script (i.e. Ubuntu:16.04, Python 3.5, Bazel 0.15.0 and GCC 5.4.0) and not the host OS where the script is executed.

body: I updated the info and removed any related to GPU/CUDA. Please, note that this issue happens while running the `tensorflow/tools/docker/parameterized_docker_build.sh` script on a CentOS 7.4 host. The script creates a devel docker container that is used to build TensorFlow. That is, all the environment fields are related to the docker container configured by the script (i.e. Ubuntu:16.04, Python 3.5, Bazel 0.15.0 and GCC 5.4.0) and not the host OS where the script is executed.
